extractFactDictList.question: What percentage of women are affected by fibroids by the age of 50?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Fibroids are very common, affecting up to 80% of women by the age of The exact cause of fibroids is not yet fully understood, but there are several factors that are believed to contribute to their development.

extractFactDictList.question: How many reasons do fibroids occur?
extractFactDictList.sentence: One of the main reasons why fibroids occur is due to hormonal imbalances.
